definition: affording an abundant supply, people who have possessions and wealth (considered as a group)
details:
adjective
- affording an abundant supply
= synonyms: ample
- strong
= synonyms: deep
- marked by great fruitfulness
= synonyms: fat, fertile, productive
- pleasantly full and mellow
= example: pleasantly full and mellow
- very productive
= example: very productive
- possessing material wealth
= example: possessing material wealth
- having an abundant supply of desirable qualities or substances (especially natural resources)
= example: having an abundant supply of desirable qualities or substances (especially natural resources)
- suggestive of or characterized by great expense
= example: suggestive of or characterized by great expense
- high in mineral content
- marked by richness and fullness of flavor
= example: marked by richness and fullness of flavor
= synonyms: racy, robust, full-bodied
- of great worth or quality
= example: of great worth or quality
- containing plenty of fat, or eggs, or sugar
= example: containing plenty of fat, or eggs, or sugar
noun
- people who have possessions and wealth (considered as a group)
= example: people who have possessions and wealth (considered as a group)
